welcome_message_body: Welcome to Brandermill, a charming city known for its beautiful lakes, outdoor activities, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to discover all the wonderful things this city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Richmond International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Richmond International Airport serves domestic flights for American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Richmond International Airport serves domestic flights for JetBlue and Southwest.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Richmond International Airport serves domestic flights for Allegiant, Frontier, and Spirit.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'RIC-FreeWiFi' and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dinwiddie County Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dinwiddie County Airport, handling all cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
